description: This file defines the UserService class, which manages user registration, lookup, and password verification in a backend application.

classes.name: UserService
classes.description: Service class for user management, including registration and password verification.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user after checking for duplicate username and email.

methods.name: findById
methods.description: Retrieves a user by their UUID.

methods.name: findByUsername
methods.description: Retrieves a user by username, case-insensitive.

methods.name: verifyPassword
methods.description: Verifies if the provided password matches the stored password hash.
